ARS_PREFIX_TEST.desc: Route prefix configuration in ARS_NHG_PREFIX_LIST table.

ARS_MEMBER_TEST.desc: Next-hop member configuration in ARS_NHG_MEMBER_LIST table.

ARS_TEST_TOO_MANY_PROFILES.desc: ARS configuration with more than one profile ARS_PROFILE_LIST table.

ARS_MEMBER_TEST_INVALID_IP.desc: Next-hop member configuration with invalid IP value in ARS_NHG_MEMBER_LIST table.

ARS_PREFIX_TEST_INVALID_PREFIX.desc: Prefix configuration with invalid prefix value in ARS_NHG_PREFIX_LIST table.

ARS_MEMBER_TEST_INVALID_LINK.desc: Next-hop member configuration with invalid link value in ARS_MIN_PATH_INTERFACE_LIST table.
